import{unit}from'@ant-design/cssinjs';const genVirtualStyle=token=>{const{componentCls,motionDurationMid,lineWidth,lineType,tableBorderColor,calc}=token;const tableBorder="".concat(unit(lineWidth)," ").concat(lineType," ").concat(tableBorderColor);const rowCellCls="".concat(componentCls,"-expanded-row-cell");return{["".concat(componentCls,"-wrapper")]:{// ========================== Row ==========================

["&".concat(componentCls,"-virtual")]:{["".concat(componentCls,"-placeholder ").concat(componentCls,"-cell")]:{borderInlineEnd:tableBorder,borderBottom:tableBorder}}}}};};export default genVirtualStyle;
